author: Staff Reporter
text:
Officials on Friday seized cash totalling Rs. 56.56 lakh that was transported in a car without valid documents.

A Static Surveillance Team intercepted a car near Kottai Boys Higher Secondary School in the city. The car belongs to a private realtor in the city and the team found two bags with money Rs. 56,56,820.

Inquiries with the marketing manager and the driver revealed that they do not possess any valid documents for the cash. The money was seized and handed over to the Returning Officer for Salem West Assembly Constituency and Revenue Divisional Officer C. Vijaybabu.
title: Rs. 56.56 lakh seized
